description:
This soft cotton tee supports a step in the right direction. It uses material that's farmed organically, but not yet certified. It helps farmers as they make the 3-year journey towards full organic certification.Cotton in Conversion supports farms getting organic certification.Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.Regular fit.

        Sustainability








Organic








                      Organically grown content
name: Patagonia Cotton in Conversion T-Shirt - Men's
